Server module¶

Messenger’s server app. Passes messages between the clients, handles user registration and authorization processes, stores users’ public keys for encryption.

Usage:

python server.py [-a {listen_address}] [-p {server_port}] [--no-gui]

  1. -a - sets a listen address for the server.

  2. -p - sets a listen port for the server.

  3. –no-gui - starts the server without a GUI (type /exit to close).

Examples:

python server.py -a localhost

Server will only listen for connections from “localhost”

python server.py -p 7777 --no-gui

Launch the server without a GUI and make it listen on port 7777

server.py¶

Main server app launcher module, contains a CLI arguments parser and an initialization script for network module and GUI window.

server.**arg_parser**()

CLI parameters parser. Returns a tuple of

  • address

  • port (validated)

  • flag for launching without a GUI

add_user.py¶

class server.add_user.RegisterUser(database, server)¶

Server user register dialog window class.

save_data()¶

Method for validating a new user and saving data to the DB.

class server.config_window.ConfigWindow(config)¶

Server configuration window.

initUI()¶

Window settings

open_file_dialog()¶

Path selection method.

save_server_config()¶

Settings saving method.

Validates settings and stores them to a config file.

core.py¶

class server.core.MessageProcessor(address, port, db)¶

Main server class.

authorize_user(message, sock)¶

Method for performing an authorization process.

Checks whether a user is already logged in, checks for password validity and finally adds a client to the list of connected sockets.

static form_response(*args, **kwargs)¶

Returns response object for the given code.

init_socket()¶

Method for listen socket initialization.

process_message(message)¶

Method for passing client messages to other clients.

remove_client(client)¶

Method for disconnecting a client.

Closes a socket, stores info in the DB and removes a socket object from connected clients list.

run()¶

Main server cycle.

send_contacts(username)¶

Method for sending a list of contacts to the client.

send_userlist(sock)¶

Method for sending a userlist to a client’s socket.

service_update_lists()¶

Method for sending response 205 (update user lists) to all clients.

Method for checking whether a user is present within a DB.

Method for retrieving a complete message history for all users.

Method for retrieving a stored user’s public key.

Method for retrieving a user’s login history.

on_login(username, ip_address, port, key)¶

Stores relevant data for user login.

Adds a new user into Users or finds an existing user and puts them into ActiveUsers. Also adds a LoginHistory entry.

on_logout(username)¶

Removes user from ActiveUsers on logout.

remove_user(name)¶

Method for user removal from the DB.

store_message(sender_name, recipient_name, content)¶

Method for storing a new message in the DB.

users_list()¶

Method for retrieving a complete user list.
